SysTrayMenuEvent - class snoozesoft.systray4j.SysTrayMenuEvent.
Instances of this class are passed to systray menu listeners who want to be informed whenever a systray icon or a menu item is clicked.

SysTrayMenuListener - interface snoozesoft.systray4j.SysTrayMenuListener.
The interface that systray menu listeners must implement in order to receive systray menu events from systray icons or menu items.
